mutants.original_line: """This function will calculate the perimeter of a triangle

mutants.code:
def calculatePerimeter(s1, s2, s3):
    """This function will calculate the perimeter of a triangle
    given its three side lengths"""
    return s1 + s2 - s3

def calculatePerimeter(s1, s2, s3):
    """This function will calculate the perimeter of a triangle
    given its three side lengths"""
    return (s1 + s2) * s3

def calculatePerimeter(s1, s2, s3):
    """This function will calculate the perimeter of a triangle
    given its three side lengths"""
    return s1 - s2 + s3

def calculatePerimeter(s1, s2, s3):
    """This function will calculate the perimeter of a triangle
    given its three side lengths"""
    return s1 * s2 + s3
